Senegal seeks consensus on date for delayed presidential electionSenegal's President Macky Sall on Monday urged participants in a national dialogue to reach a consensus on a date to hold a delayed presidential election, failing which he will ask the Constitutional Council to find his replacement when his mandate ends on April 2. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 23:29:52 GMT T6TBD6J5XNPBNGORU7BZMEISI4 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/senegal-seeks-consensus-date-delayed-presidential-election-2024-02-26/Reuters世界非洲
Putin vows to boost Russian special forces' ability to strikePresident Vladimir Putin promised late on Monday to increase the mobility and striking potential of Russia's special operations forces, saying this is a key priority to make the country's army stronger. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 23:27:45 GMT ICMPXWDWCJLKHOPHMRN7AZXIDE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-vows-boost- Russian-special-forces-strike-ability-2024-02-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Benin offers 2,000 troops to Haiti force -US ambassadorBenin has offered 2,000 troops to support a planned Kenyan-led international force to help Haitian national police fight armed gangs, U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations Linda Thomas-Greenfield told a press conference on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 23:19:46 GMT 53KTI4JHHJOH5DRO2RP2IKL64Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/benin-offers-2000-troops-haiti-force-us-ambassador-2024-02-26/Reuters世界美洲
Mexican avocados grown on illegal orchards should not be exported to U.S., ambassador saysMexican avocados grown on illegal orchards should not be exported to the United States, the largest importer of the popular staple used in guacamole, the U.S. ambassador to Mexico said Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 23:13:14 GMT YUUCV5BLCBPJ3FGPNHW2HPI2PQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexican-avocados-grown-illegal-orchards-should-not-be-exported-us-ambassador-2024-02-26/Cassandra Garrison世界美洲
Biden hopes to have a ceasefire in Israeli conflict by next MondayPresident Joe Biden said he hopes to have a ceasefire in the conflict between Israel and Hamas by next week. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 22:48:02 GMT 6ZTM2YS3ZNKXPBSBYLLZ5MYU3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-hopes-to-have-ceasefire-israeli-conflict-by-next-monday-2024-02-26/Jeff Mason世界
Colombia, ELN rebels hold meeting after troubles at peace talksColombia's government and the National Liberation Army (ELN)rebels said on Monday they have held a meeting amid difficulties at peace talks and will meet to continue negotiations in April. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 22:44:41 GMT B6D2DUFWSNM4FHKNOEL3KM44I https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/colombia-eln-rebels-team-meeting-after-troubles-peace-talks-2024-02-26/Reuters世界美洲
Dutch to give 100 million euros to Czech initiative to buy ammunition for UkraineThe Netherlands will contribute 100 million euros ($108.47 million) to a Czech initiative to buy ammunition for Ukraine from countries around the world, Dutch Prime Minister Mark Rutte said on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 22:38:57 GMT LNZE724Y6ZOYDBOJFGZIL6YJJY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/dutch-give-100-million-euro-czech-initiative-to-buy-ammunition-ukraine-2024-02-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Brazil partners with largest climate finance alliance to boost green growthBrazil on Monday announced it would partner with the world's biggest financial climate coalition to turbocharge funding for clean energy and efforts to restore nature, such as reforesting the Amazon rainforest. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 22:31:13 GMT 2ZGYBJ5RGJMJVE2G6577FUN2GU https://www.reuters.com/sustainability/sustainable-finance-reporting/brazil-partners-with-largest-climate-finance-alliance-boost-green-growth-2024-02-26/Jake Spring, Simon Jessop可持续发展气候与能源
Chinese airlines can boost US flights to 50 per week, US saysChinese passenger airlines will be allowed to boost their weekly round-trip U.S. flights to 50 starting on March 31, up from the current 35, the U.S. Transportation Department said on Monday, returning the market to about one-third of pre-pandemic levels. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 22:23:32 GMT CBXJPSU5Q5ICZJFUHDDMUJYLV4 https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/chinese-passenger-airlines-could-increase-number-us-flights-usdot-2024-02-26/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
France's Macron says sending troops to Ukraine cannot be ruled outFrance's President Emmanuel Macron said on Monday there was no consensus on sending troops to Ukraine, but the subject could not be ruled out. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 22:21:55 GMT Z2VV6C24K5PGVIUWDHLGH57A6M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/france-macron-says-sending-troops-ukraine-cannot-be-ruled-out-2024-02-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Hungarian parliament elects top court chief as new presidentHungary's parliament elected Constitutional Court chief Tamas Sulyok as the country's next president on Monday, two weeks after the unexpected resignation of Katalin Novak. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 18:10:21 GMT S7QCCEOFORNQ5KCVQ55YU5FUHI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungarian-parliament-elects-top-court-chief-new-president-2024-02-26/Boldizsar Gyori世界欧洲
